column4: So today I tried to update to 11.10 but got in a tad of trouble http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1841930 (maybe related). I removed unity when coming to 11.04 but today I decided to install unity2d and the normal unity package.
Upon restarting I've faced with this http://i.imgur.com/oZ5ln.png
It didn't update to 11.10 though I'm still on 11.04
